goal: Add EquipmentSlots to Character - self-contained equipment tracking with typed accessors

sessions.notes: Designed EquippedItem wrapper with composition (Item field, not interface embedding). Character is self-contained - resolves slot → inventory → EquippedItem. AsArmor()/AsWeapon() typed accessors abstract runtime casts.

Added EquipmentSlots map[InventorySlot]string, EquippedItem wrapper with AsArmor()/AsWeapon(), GetEquippedSlot(), EquipItem(), UnequipItem() methods. Changed from struct to map after feedback - combat slots only (MainHand, OffHand, Armor).

sessions.task: Add JSON roundtrip test and verify persistence
sessions.notes: Added TestEquipmentSlots_JSONRoundtrip to verify map with typed keys serializes correctly. 25 tests all passing. PR #402 ready for review.
